mapper.select: select no, division, title, creatDate, hits, important from ( select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, notice_important important, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_no desc) num from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%' order by notice_date desc ) where num between ${startPage} and ${endPage}
select ceil(count(*)/5) from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%'

select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, notice_important important from cinemabox_notice where ROWNUM <= 4 order by notice_date desc

select * from (select notice_no no, notice_content content, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, LEAD(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as preNo, LEAD(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as preTitle, LAG(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextNo, LAG(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextTitle from cinemabox_notice )A where A. no= #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into cinemabox_notice (notice_no, notice_division, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_important) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{division}, #{title}, #{content}, sysDate, #{important})
mapper.update: update cinemabox_notice set notice_hits = notice_hits + 1 where notice_no = #{no}
update cinemabox_notice set notice_content = #{content}, notice_title = #{title} where notice_no = #{no}
